channel.title: Writing on Chi's site
channel.description: Recent content in Writing on Chi's site

item.title: Writing Skills
item.description: 前半句介绍别的方法好的地方，后半句转折存在的问题 xxxx. However, they also suffer from the problem of lack of standardization introduced by these pipeline steps and workflows processes To address this, we introduce 别再用 more and more important啦 The importance of …. is increasingly apparent in …. 有很多方法都尝试解决这个问题 There have been numerous methods that attempt to circumvent this problem 我们的方法的灵感源自于… Our technique is inspired by the recent work in learning vector representations of words using neural networks (Bengio et al.
